description: Reactive state management with isolated side effects powered by Schematics

name: Augury
description: A Chrome and Firefox Dev Tools extension for debugging Angular applications.

name: Spectator
description: A Powerful Tool to Simplify Your Angular Tests

name: Auto Spies
description: Easy and type safe way to write spies for tests, for both sync and async (promises, Observables) returning methods.

name: Angular Testing Library
description: Angular Testing Library builds on top of DOM Testing Library by adding APIs for working with Angular components.

name: Prime NG
description: UI Component Library featuring elegant, high-performance, accessible and fully customizable UI Components.

name: Scully

name: Angular Essentials
description: Essential VS code extensions for Angular developers.

name: Learning Angular
description: This book will demystify Angular as a framework, as well as provide clear instructions and examples on how to get started with writing scalable Angular applications. By Aristeidis Bampakos

name: Angular for Enterprise-Ready Web Applications
